page.title: 20POCKET MONEY.
page.content: AS A THIRTEEN YEAR OLD,I RECEIVE 75p POCKET MONEY WEEKLY.I AM GIVEN THIS MONEY FOR FEEDING OUR TWO CATS AND POLISHING MY SCHOOL SHOES.I EARN A BONUS IF I DO EXTRA JOBS;CLEANING OUR CAR FOR EXAMPLE.MY BROTHER HOWARD,WHO IS ELEVEN,IS GIVEN 50p POCKET MONEY.HE EARNS THIS BY LAYING THE FIRE AND POLISHING HIS SHOES. WE BOTH RECEIVE OUR POCKET MONEY FROM DAD.ANY BONUS MONEY WE EARN COMES FROM MUM OR DAD,DEPENDING ON WHO ASKS US TO DO THE JOB.IN ADDITION TO THIS WE SOMETIMES RECEIVE MONEY AS PRESENTS ON SPECIAL OCCASIONS, SUCH AS CHRISTMAS OR BIRTHDAYS. I LIKE TO SAVE MY MONEY IN AN INVESTMENT ACCOUT.THIS MEANS I RECEIVE ELEVEN % INTEREST EVERY YEAR.WHEN I DO SPEND MY MONEY I LIKE TO BUY CLOTHES AND SHOES FOR MYSELF,AND PRESENTS FOR OTHER PEOPLE. BY ZOE HILTON
